name: Classic White T-Shirt
description: A versatile, comfortable white t-shirt made from 100% cotton. Perfect for layering or wearing on its own.

name: Blue Denim Jeans
description: Stylish slim-fit denim jeans with a classic blue wash. Durable and perfect for everyday wear.

name: Hooded Sweatshirt
description: Soft, comfortable hoodie available in multiple colors. Great for a casual, laid-back style.

name: Leather Jacket
description: Classic black leather jacket with a fitted design and zip-up closure. Adds an edge to any outfit.

name: Flannel Shirt
description: Cozy, plaid flannel shirt with button-up front. Perfect for layering during cooler seasons.

name: Chino Pants
description: Classic-fit chino pants with a soft, comfortable fabric. Great for both casual and formal occasions.

name: Casual Sneakers
description: Comfortable and stylish sneakers suitable for everyday wear, featuring a minimalist design.

name: Cotton Polo Shirt
description: Breathable cotton polo shirt available in various colors. A timeless choice for smart-casual outfits.

name: Summer Dress
description: Lightweight, floral summer dress that is perfect for warm weather. Elegant and comfortable.

name: Wool Scarf
description: Warm and cozy wool scarf, perfect for winter. Available in various colors.
